thread.title: Exclusive: Why Nicola McLean covered her eye as she tried to quit CBB following Kim Woodburn attack
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Why Nicola McLean covered her eye as she tried to quit CBB following Kim Woodburn attack

author: Nicola Agius
title: Exclusive: Why Nicola McLean covered her eye as she tried to quit CBB following Kim Woodburn attack
text:
Kim Woodburn targeted Nicola McLean in her most vicious outburst yet on Celebrity Big Brother. 
And throughout the fiery confrontation, the petite model was seen desperately covering her right eye as she tried to stand up for herself. 
Even when she raced to the Diary to escape, the mother of two was still seen trying to protect her eye. 
Was she hurt? Had the brutal exchange turned physical? Kim Woodburn targeted Nicola McLean in her most vicious outburst yet on Celebrity Big Brother 
"Nicola is absolutely fine," a CBB spokesperson told Mirror Online. Read More Kim Woodburn confesses she buried her stillborn baby in a park... as she suffers meltdown on CBB 
"She was trying to remove her contact lenses at the time. She was in the middle of doing so when the argument broke out. She was just trying to take out her contacts." Throughout the fiery confrontation, the petite model was seen desperately covering her right eye as she tried to stand up for herself (Photo: TV Grab) 
Nicola had a complete meltdown in the diary room after the explosive argument – that later saw Kim being removed from the house.
